title: How to Find Users on Spotify on PC or Mac

steps.title: Open Spotify on your PC or Mac.
steps.content: Open Spotify on your PC or Mac. It’s the green icon with three curved black lines inside. You’ll find it in the Applications folder on a Mac or in the All Apps area of the Start menu in Windows. If you’re not already signed in to your account, sign in now.

steps.title: Click the search bar.
steps.content: Click the search bar. It’s at the top-center area of the app.

steps.title: Type spotify:user:Username and press ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return.
steps.content: Type spotify:user:Username and press ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return . Replace “Username” with the username of the person you want to find. For example, to find user John, you would type spotify:user:john and press ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return .

steps.title: Click FOLLOW.
steps.content: Click FOLLOW . If you want to keep tabs on what your friend’s listening to, you can follow their activity this way. This is optional.

steps.title: Open Spotify on your PC or Mac.
steps.content: Open Spotify on your PC or Mac. It’s the green icon with three curved black lines inside. You’ll find it in the Applications folder on a Mac or in the All Apps area of the Start menu in Windows. If you’re not already signed in to your account, sign in now.

steps.title: Click the downward-pointing arrow next to your username.
steps.content: Click the downward-pointing arrow next to your username. It’s at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Scroll down and click CONNECT TO FACEBOOK.
steps.content: Scroll down and click CONNECT TO FACEBOOK . It’s under the “Facebook” header. A Facebook sign-in window will appear.

steps.title: Enter your login details and click Log In.
steps.content: Enter your login details and click Log In . You are now signed in to Facebook.

steps.title: Click the Search bar.
steps.content: Click the Search bar. It’s at the top of the screen. You can use this bar to find your Facebook friends who have Spotify accounts.

steps.title: Type the person’s name.
steps.content: Type the person’s name. As you type, a list of matching search results will appear.

steps.title: Click the person you want to view.
steps.content: Click the person you want to view. This opens their Spotify homepage.

steps.title: Click FOLLOW.
steps.content: Click FOLLOW . If you want to keep tabs on what your friend’s listening to, you can follow their activity this way. This is optional.
